name: The Reverse of the Summit (Lane Howard)
name_original: The Reverse of the Summit (Lane Howard)
description:
You've always been a skillful skier. Do you dare detour into the deep and dangerous caves below?

Mouse to move.

Left click to jump.

Right click to leave unharmed, forever questioning the riches that could have been.

The Reverse of the Summit was originally made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo. Now, it is released in an updated fashion with many gameplay improvements and new features. 

Spend the money you get from your runs on new outfits for your character.  Compete to get the high score on the online leaderboard.
